metadata.dcterms:title: Long-term Non-invasive Ventilation Therapies in Children: A Scoping Review
metadata.dcterms:creator: Castro Codesal, Maria
Featherstone, Robin
Martinez Carrasco, Carmen
Katz, Sherri
DeHaan, Kristie
Chan, Elaine
Bendiak, Glenda
Almeida, Fernanda
Young, Rochelle
Olmstead, Deborah
Waters, Karen
Sullivan, Collin
Woolf, Vicki
Hartling, Lisa
MacLean, Joanna
metadata.dcterms:description: The purpose of this scoping review is to provide an overview of the evidence for the use of long-term non-invasive ventilation (NIV) in children.
metadata.dcterms:subject: Medicine, Health and Life Sciences
ventilation therapies
pediatrics
respiratory insufficiencies
positive airway pressure
noninvasive ventilation
review
non-invasive ventilation therapies
respiratory medicine
sleep apnea syndromes
metadata.dcterms:isReferencedBy: Castro Codesal, Maria L et al. 'Long-Term Non-Invasive Ventilation Therapies in Children: A Scoping Review Protocol.' BMJ Open 5.8 (2015), doi, 10.1136/bmjopen-2015-008697, http://bmjopen.bmj.com/content/5/8/e008697.full
